attributes.action: Change the age to buy tobacco based products back to 16.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think it is unfair that we have legally been allowed to buy tobacco based products for some time now and suddenly overnight we were not longer able to as of 1st october 2007. As future voters this decision really turn us off politics and it has already caused an increase in anti social behaviour. also not being able to buy tobacco based products under 18 are getting in troble for standin out side shops wateing for someone to buy them tobacco based products, it is alos the most stressful time for people at college as there is exams going on and some sutdant beleave smoking helps to calm therm down and i thnk this too. thanks Chris

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
